revised_prompt: Create a professional banner advertisement with dimensions of 1200x628 pixels. The banner should have a clean, modern, and uncluttered look in a vibrant, eye-catching color scheme. The background should be subtle, ensuring high contrast against the text for enhanced readability. In descending order of size, the following text elements should be included: The brand 'TechStore' displayed the largest and boldest, either at the top or center, the message 'Up to 70% Off' in a medium size in the center area, and a call-to-action button with the words 'Shop Now', either at the bottom or in a prominent position. Both the typography and the overall design should underscore a professional advertising quality. The text should be sans-serif, legible, crystal clear, and easy to read with no decorative words or complex patterns behind it.
